name: Little Red Riding Hood and the Good Spirit of the Woods
name_original: Little Red Riding Hood and the Good Spirit of the Woods
description:
Little Red is visiting her grandma in the Forest of Dread- protect her until she reaches her destination! 

Little Red is a game made for Ludum Dare 46 with the theme Keep It Alive. You play as the Good Spirit of the Woods, and it is your task to protect Little Red from the horrors of the forest as she makes her way to grandma's house.

How To Play

WASD - Movement
Left Mouse Button - Attack
E (rapid) - Gather berries
Q - Drop berries
Shift - Eat berries
Spacebar (rapid) - Break free

As Little Red makes her way through the forest, its hostile denizens will attempt to stop her. Fight them off before they can reach her!

Berries are a resource that can be used for multiple sources! Leave some on Little Red's path, and she will dash for a short period of time. Alternatively, you can eat some and have stronger attacks for yourself!
